transactionFeeDescription: The network applies a transaction fee, which varies based on blockchain usage. RollerCoin does not charge any transaction fees.
oncePerDay: Las transacciones de retirada se procesan una vez al día.
withdrawDelay: Withdrawal time depends on the blockchain, and may take up to 7-10 business days.

depositPage.minDepositText: Due to high transaction fees in {{network}} network, we have temporary limited the minimum {{baseCurrency}} deposit amount to {{value}} {{baseCurrency}}.
